submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        horizontalCut.sort()
        verticalCut.sort()
        hsum, vsum = sum(horizontalCut), sum(verticalCut)
        hdup, vdup = 1, 1
        i, j = m-2, n-2
        result = 0
        
        while i >= 0 and j >= 0:
            if horizontalCut[i] > verticalCut[j]:
                result += horizontalCut[i] * hdup
                vdup += 1
                hsum -= horizontalCut[i]
                i -= 1
            elif horizontalCut[i] < verticalCut[j]:
                result += verticalCut[j] * vdup
                hdup += 1
                vsum -= verticalCut[j]
                j -= 1
            elif hsum > vsum:
                result += horizontalCut[i] * hdup
                vdup += 1
                hsum -= horizontalCut[i]
                i -= 1
            else:
                result += verticalCut[j] * vdup
                hdup += 1
                vsum -= verticalCut[j]
                j -= 1
        while i >= 0:
            result += horizontalCut[i] * hdup
            i -= 1
        while j >= 0:
            result += verticalCut[j] * vdup
            j -= 1
        return result
